trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
text: If the Monkey King fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The Monkey King has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Simian Affinity
text: The Monkey King can communicate with primates as if they shared a language. In addition, he can control primates with an Intelligence of 8 or lower that are within 120 feet of him.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The Monkey King makes three golden staff attacks or two golden staff attacks and one tail attack.

action.name: Golden Staff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) radiant damage.

action.name: Enlightened Ray
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +12 to hit, range 100 ft., one target. 18 (4d8) radiant damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Charisma saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Tail
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

reaction.name: Drunken Dodge
text: When the Monkey King is hit by a weapon attack, he gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage until the end of that turn.

The celestial (simian) can take 4 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The celestial (simian) regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Options
text: The Monkey King can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Monkey King regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Great Leap
text: The Monkey King moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Quick Staff
text: The Monkey King makes a golden staff attack.

legendary.name: Golden Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
text: Each creature of the Monkey King's choice within 10 feet of him must make a DC 18 Charisma saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
